tool.name: Fetch Indels
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool estimates the number of indels for every alignment block of the MAF file.
-----
.. class:: warningmark
**Note**
Any block/s not containing exactly 2 species will be omitted.
-----
**Example**
- For the following alignment block::
a score=7233.0 s hg18.chr1 100 35 + 247249719 AT--GACTGAGGACTTAGTTTAAGATGTTCCTACT s rheMac2.chr11 200 31 + 134511895 ATAAG-CGGACGACTTAGTTTAAGATGTTCC----
- running this tool will return::
#Block Source Seq1_Start Seq1_End Seq2_Start Seq2_End Indel_length 1 hg18.chr1 101 102 202 204 2 1 rheMac2.chr11 103 104 204 205 1 1 rheMac2.chr11 129 133 229 230 4
